name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LATERLY for YouTube: Like Trello but for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better manage YouTube videos by adding them to your To Do (To Watch) list from YouTube, tagging them within Laterly web app and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage your YouTube videos like "To Do(s)". It is like Trello (or To Doist) but for YouTube.

Features:
‚úÖ To Watch (To Do) Status for each video within YouTube. Easily mark any video as "To Watch", "Watching", "Watched" or "Abandoned".
üëç Like and Dislike Reaction for each video within YouTube.
üè∑Ô∏è Add tags to any video to find them quickly later (on Laterly Web App).
üîé Quickly search and filter videos (on Laterly Web App).
